SEARCH
Module fi.tuni.progthree.weatherapp
Package fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp

Class WeatherDataMap

java.lang.Object
fi.tuni.prog3.weatherapp.WeatherDataMap
public class WeatherDataMap extends Object
Class responsible for reading JSON data and organizing it into data structures. Reads JSON data representing current weather and forecast data from OpenWeatherMap API. Adds the data to appropriate data structures based on location and timestamp. Supports retrieval of current weather data and weather forecast data. class contains also data returning methods from data structures
Author:
Patrik Salmensaari

  • Method Details

    • addWeatherData

      public static void addWeatherData(String location, String timestamp, WeatherData weatherData)
      Adds current weather data to the map structure based on location and timestamp.
      Parameters:
      location - Place where weather data is recorded
      timestamp - Timestamp indicating when the data was retrieved from OpenWeatherMap, day.month_hour.minute
      weatherData - WeatherData object containing the weather information

    • addWeatherForecast

      public static void addWeatherForecast(String location, String dayMonthTimestamp, String hourTimestamp, WeatherData weatherData)
      Adds weather forecast data to the map structure based on location and timestamp.
      Parameters:
      location - Place where weather forecast data is recorded
      dayMonthTimestamp - Day.month timestamp indicating the date of the forecast
      hourTimestamp - Hour.minute timestamp indicating the time of the forecast
      weatherData - WeatherData object containing the forecast information

    • getWeatherDataMap

      public static HashMap<String,HashMap<String,WeatherData>> getWeatherDataMap()
      Retrieves the map structure containing current weather data.
      Returns:
      The map structure containing current weather data

    • getWeatherForecastMap

      public static HashMap<String,HashMap<String,TreeMap<String,WeatherData>>> getWeatherForecastMap()
      Retrieves the map structure containing weather forecast data.
      Returns:
      The map structure containing weather forecast data

    • getCurrentData

      public static WeatherData getCurrentData(String location, String timestamp)
      Retrieves current weather data for a specific location and timestamp.
      Parameters:
      location - Place where the weather data is recorded
      timestamp - Timestamp indicating when the data was retrieved
      Returns:
      The WeatherData object containing the current weather information, or null if the data is not available

    • getForecastData

      public static WeatherData getForecastData(String location, String dayMonthStamp, String hourMinuteStamp)
      Retrieves weather forecast data for a specific location, date, and time.
      Parameters:
      location - Place where the weather forecast data is recorded
      dayMonthStamp - Day.month timestamp indicating the date of the forecast
      hourMinuteStamp - Hour.minute timestamp indicating the time of the forecast
      Returns:
      The WeatherData object containing the forecast information, or null if the data is not available

      Returns:
      The temperature in Kelvin (double).

    • addJsonDataToMap

      public void addJsonDataToMap(String fileName) throws Exception
      Adds JSON data from the specified file to the map structure. if fileName contains current it will add data to currentWeatherMap if fileName contains forecast it will add data to weatherForecastMap.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the file containing JSON data
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while processing the JSON data

    • getCurrentTemperature

      public double getCurrentTemperature(String location, String timestamp)
      Retrieves the current temperature for a specific location and timestamp.
      Parameters:
      location - Place where the weather data is recorded
      timestamp - Timestamp indicating when the data was retrieved
      Returns:
      The current temperature in Celsius, or Double. NaN if the data is not available

    • getCurrentFeelsLike

      timestamp - Timestamp indicating when the data was retrieved
      Returns:

      public int getCurrentWindDir(String location, String timestamp)
      Retrieves the current wind direction for a specific location and timestamp.
      Parameters:
      location - Place where the weather data is recorded
      timestamp - Timestamp indicating when the data was retrieved
      Returns:
      The current wind direction in number, or -1 if the data is not available

      timestamp - Timestamp indicating when the data was retrieved
      Returns:

    • getCurrentWeatherIcon

      public String getCurrentWeatherIcon(String location, String timestamp)
      Retrieves the current rain amount for a specific location and timestamp. weather icon will be later transfered into picture, but now we just get iconUrl
      Parameters:
      location - Place where the weather data is recorded
      timestamp - Timestamp indicating when the data was retrieved
      Returns:
      The current weather iconurl in string, or null if the data is not available

    • getForecastTemp

      public double getForecastTemp(String location, String labelDay, int i)
      Retrieves the temperature forecast for a specific location, day, and hour.
      Parameters:
      location - Place where the weather forecast data is recorded
      labelDay - Day label for the forecast (relative to current date)
      i - Hour index for the forecast (0-23)
      Returns:
      The forecasted temperature in Celsius, or Double. NaN if the data is not available

    • getForecastMaxTemp

      i - Hour index for the forecast (0-23)
      Returns:

      labelDay - Day label for the forecast (relative to current date)

      labelDay - Day label for the forecast (relative to current date)

      Returns:
